tags: I often feel like im watching different films than everone else
my dash has been full of rage are you all sure youre not being influenced by the mind stone?
i know I would like some...
Screenrant is babying his actions and that article is TRASH
summary:
Marvel: The mind stone influences people and unbeknownst to Loki fueled his rage. 
In other words, It aggravated his aggression....
body:
Marvel: The mind stone influences people and unbeknownst to Loki fueled his rage.

In other words, It aggravated his aggression. It didn’t order him to do anything he wasn’t already willing to do. IMO, THAT. IS. HARDLY. MIND. CONTROL.

What Loki did to Barton and Selvigg, that was absolutely mind control. He could tell them to jump off a bridge for him and they absolutely would. Thanos gave Loki the scepter and simply set him loose. Again, Loki was influenced by it, but still driven by his own twisted desires and rage.

Y’all demons on this hell site after some rando at screenrant writes a poorly written article: MARVEL SAID LOKI WAS MIND XONTROLJAHBDBADWRITINFLAZYWRITIN GNFNDU FUCK U MARVEL.

Yeah okay they do suffer from lazy writing BUT they never said he was mind controlled!

Also, the scepter/mindstone had a clear influence over every Avengers in A1 and it is an established fact that this is what the scepter does. It’s hardly a retcon imo.

EXAMPLE: The scene where all the avengers start fighting with one another on board the helicarrier. This establishes what the scepter can do to you just by being in the same room as it. They have to ask Bruce to set it down because he’d grabbed it.

Anyway, it’s late and I have officially wasted twenty minutes on this vent.

What Loki did to Barton and Selvigg, that was absolutely mind control. He could tell them to jump off a bridge for him and they absolutely would. Thanos gave Loki the scepter and simply set him loose. Again, Loki was influenced by it, but still driven by his own twisted desires and rage.

Y’all demons on this hell site after some rando at screenrant writes a poorly written article: MARVEL SAID LOKI WAS MIND XONTROLJAHBDBADWRITINFLAZYWRITIN GNFNDU FUCK U MARVEL.

Yeah okay they do suffer from lazy writing BUT they never said he was mind controlled!

Also, the scepter/mindstone had a clear influence over every Avengers in A1 and it is an established fact that this is what the scepter does. It’s hardly a retcon imo.

EXAMPLE: The scene where all the avengers start fighting with one another on board the helicarrier. This establishes what the scepter can do to you just by being in the same room as it. They have to ask Bruce to set it down because he’d grabbed it.

Anyway, it’s late and I have officially wasted twenty minutes on this vent.

EXAMPLE: The scene where all the avengers start fighting with one another on board the helicarrier. This establishes what the scepter can do to you just by being in the same room as it. They have to ask Bruce to set it down because he’d grabbed it.

Anyway, it’s late and I have officially wasted twenty minutes on this vent.

In other words, It aggravated his aggression. It didn’t order him to do anything he wasn’t already willing to do. IMO, THAT. IS. HARDLY. MIND. CONTROL.

title: Hello/Hei/Ciao/Привет/Привіт/Bună
body:
I speak many languages so feel free to ask me anything! Ukrainian is my first language, but I am most articulate in English.

 I take full responsibility for any grammar/spelling mistakes I make in any language, and if you have any language tips feel free to share. NEVER LET LANGUAGE BARRIERS SILENCE YOU. 

  • Jeg snakker mange språk, så vær så snill å spørre meg om noe!
  • Parlo molte lingue. Chiedimi qualunque cosa.
  • Я говорю на многих языках. можешь спрашивать меня о чем угодно.
  • Я розмовляю багатьма мовами. Запитай мене щось.
  • Eu sunt multilingv. Intreaba-ma orice.

reblog.comment:

summary: I know it’s not Christmas anymore but I just thought of a Christmas!Marvel Headcanon:
body:
I know it’s not Christmas anymore but I just thought of a Christmas!Marvel Headcanon:

Imagine Tony’s droids and bots ‘waking up’ on Christmas to the house and workshop decorated and they all have their own stockings with their names on them and Tony puts a little present in each one like a chip with new programming updates or new bolts or something special for each of them so they all know this as the ‘Christmas protocol’ and all get excited for it and love it.

blog.name: gamerforgod
blog.title: The Castle of Games Tumblr
blog.description: An INFP who loves Jesus, likes a good story, and hates injustice.

summary: Remember that idea that the first GotG film is actually the Avengers playing an RPG? What if Thor Ragnarok is Scott Lang and his...
body:
Remember that idea that the first GotG film is actually the Avengers playing an RPG? What if Thor Ragnarok is Scott Lang and his buddies playing what they think is a typical Thor Adventure. I’m just picturing them on a Friday night at Scott’s house drinking beers and listening to synthesizer music that Dave swears will provide some serious si-fi vibes.

Imagine: Scott is Thor, always excited and ready to do anything. He was also just enough of a power gamer to figure out a RAW way to make Thor’s Hammer. Nobody uses his dice for fear of bad rolls.

Luis is playing Valkyrie whose mannerisms were based on a woman he had a crush on once but who gained a ton of charater when someone asked him about Valkyrie’s backstory and he talked for a solid hour.

Kurt plays Loki and who tries to be the of reason most of the time but who also enjoys trying to seduce most of the NPCs.

And Dave is the GM who mostly improvs the sessions and intended for the Grandmaster to be a serious charater before everyone realized that his Grandmaster voice was just a Jeff Goldblum impression.

And of course Cassie plays the Hulk
